text:
Do you know how much we all
appreciate you? Having you around
really makes this island special.
That's why I picked out this lovely
heart-shaped rose bouquet just
for you. I hope you like it!

Happy Valentine's Day! You do so
much for us all that I wanted to do
something nice for you in return.
This rose bouquet is shaped like a
heart—isn't that sweet? Please
enjoy it, and thanks for being you.

Happy Valentine's Day! What better
way to celebrate than with a heart-
shaped bouquet? These roses are
special, just like you, and I truly
hope they brighten your day.
I'm always here if you need me! –Isabelle
I'm always here if you need me! –Isabelle
I'm always here if you need me! –Isabelle
